definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_category" x="207" y="33"><field name="name">Particles</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">particles_active</field><field name="comment">When true the particles will be shown for the Cyber Dog, for instance when he eats a lava bucket. Default = true</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">particles_active</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value></block></statement></block><block type="config_number_variable" x="101" y="103"><field name="name">is_the_cyber_dog_spawnable</field><field name="value">0.2</field></block><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="-11" y="179"><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Is the Cyber Dog Spawnable</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">is_the_cyber_dog_spawnable</field><field name="comment">This logic activate or not the possibility to use Strange Circuits on a Dog to make it a Cyber Dog. Its used if you dont find the Forbidden Lab structure. Default = false</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">is_the_cyber_dog_spawnable</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Cyber Dog Spawn Chance</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">spawning_chance</field><field name="comment">You can enter here a number between 0 and 1 that represents the percentage chance for the Cyber Dog of spawning. Default = 0.2</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">spawning_chance</field><field name="value">0.2</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Cyber Dog Nuke Module</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">nuke_force</field><field name="comment">At your own risks. Define the power of the Nuke module for the Cyber Dog. Default = 1000.0</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">nuke_force</field><field name="value">1000</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="config_category"><field name="name">Cyber Dog Upgrade Slot</field><statement name="write"><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">upgrade_slot_number</field><field name="comment">The number of upgrade slot you can put in your cyber dog. Default = 5</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">upgrade_slot_number</field><field name="value">5</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
